articles.title: EU to discuss relaxed travel restrictions for South Africa - BusinessTech
articles.description: European Union health ministers will discuss Tuesday whether to adjust the travel curbs the bloc’s nations have imposed on southern Africa in response to the omicron variant.
articles.content:

articles.title: European Central Bank plans to redesign euro banknotes - thejournal.ie
articles.description: A final decision on the new look is expected in 2024.
articles.content:
THE EUROPEAN CENTRAL Bank (ECB) has revealed plans to redesign its euro banknotes, with a final decision on the new look expected in 2024.
